Blog.post: Yesturday, today, and tomorrow I dislike the following: arguments with loved ones stuffed up noses bad attitudes my hair my shoes feet that hurt my toenails the letter S

For yesturday, today, and tomorrow (yes, I can see into the future), my likes are the following: the letter D the letter B greasy burgers black olives and mushrooms (together, not separately) Artur Davis Milller Lite good conversation my ex
Today, I dislike the following: diabetes sinus headaches loud people the S R F
Today, I like the following: the letter S the letter D the letter R the letter A the letter W the letter D the letter E secret service men comfortable shoes

I have been asked by Mr. Misanthrope as to why I dislike Jack Zylman. Here is my response: He has been a thorn in my side for months and I have had it. He is a close-minded moron, and basically, a waste of space. He has personally insulted myself along with others because my opinion differed from his. He also attacked my alma mater, and frankly, that ain't cool. Honestly, for me to say I dislike Jack. is a stretch. People like him give our party a bad name.
Today, I dislike the following: sunburns dumb boys long car trips fights people that complicate relationships bad attitudes Jack Zylman
Today, I like the following: lakes sunshine sleep the color purple my ex
Today, I dislike the following: JACK ZYLMAN crazy people JACK ZYLMAN headaches JACK ZYLMAN dreary weather Oh, and don't let me forget to mention - JACK ZYLMAN
Today, I like the following: the letter J the letter F pizza good friends Texas soup warm sweaters
Today, I dislike the following: the letter F the letter q (thank you, Mr. Misanthrope - I agree) cold offices smelly feet dry lips chicken casseroles cream of mushroom soup
Today, I like the following: sunshine my outfit the letter J, but still not F bandaids kleenex
Today, I like the following: basset hounds my ex-husband my job my hair
Today, I dislike the following: the letter J ocra Ford Focuses President Bush the letter f people who drive slow
Welcome to Jellybean Speaks Her Mind. This is my first time to have a blog, so no promises on how great it will be.
